name: Math League - Free
description:
Prepare your math troops in this fast-paced strategy game. You remember math rules? Addition remove minus. Multiplication remove divide. And vice versa. Upgrade them and place them in one of the entrances to the enemy base. Or place them in the tower and get extra defense. Make a strategy but beware, your opponent can attack at any time. Quick game of epic equations.

Free version, NO pay to win. All features for free, NO accidental "in-app purchases".

How to play video:

For the family on vacation and the kids in the back seat of your car.
